subproject.corporate outcome:
- Civic engagement, through civil society organizations, voluntary associations, trade unions, political parties, and private sector organizations, enables all people to influence public policy processes. 
- Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration 
- Communication channels support government accountability and transparency through e-governance, independent journalism, and access to information policies
subproject.description: Capacity of rule of law institutions strengthened: capacity of Ministry of Justice reviewed and strengthened; support to the Ministry of Justice to the lead the implementation of the National Justice Sector Strategy provided; implementation of the 'Justice for the Future' project ensured; development and implementation of legal aid strategy supported; legislative drafting skills enhanced; public awareness on the Ministry's work raised and access to relevant legal information by the public enhanced; and capacity of the Attorney-General's Office and the High Judicial Council strengthened.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Ministry of Justice/Management

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services

subproject.description: Access to justice at local and grassroots levels enhanced: legal aid services provided and strengthened, particularly for the poor and the disadvantaged; legal literacy amongst rights-holders and duty-bearers improved; accountability mechanisms put in place; human rights advocacy promoted; models for potential linkages between formal and informal justice systems reviewed and developed.

subproject.title: Access to Justice

subproject.description: .Gender and juvenile justice improved: legislation related to gender justice and its enforcement reviewed; formulation and adoption of a national youth policy supported in partnership with others; gender and juvenile justice strategy and action plan developed; and capacity of law enforcement and legal professionals on gender justice developed.
